name: The Word Finder
description:
The ultimate word descrambler !
download THE Word Finder to help you out with solving puzzles and help in a variety of games. Use as a help tool (hopefully not cheat) in games like scrabble, jumble, text twist, words with friends, etc.

Enter "?" for blank tiles and up to 11 letters. Enter extra strings of letters if you know certain parts of the word.

Download now, for FREE!!!
